welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cutlerville, the charming city known for its friendly locals and picturesque scenery. We invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gerald R. Ford International Airport is a modern and spacious facility with a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A offers a wide selection of shops, restaurants, and lounges for travelers to enjoy while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is home to many major airlines and features comfortable seating areas and charging stations for electronic devices.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Park Township Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Park Township Airport is reserved for private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
